Hello! This is our Jekyll School students group.

This is your group page where people can find you and you can say hello.
To appear here, just add a file to the _students folder following the template in AliceA.md.
Later, you can edit this paragraph inside /_students/index.html to add a group introduction.

Alice A

Hey, I'm Alice. I <3 Bob and I <3 chatting!

Hello world, I'm Bob. I quite like Alice.
